properties.name: use.swagger
properties.description: This annotation turns swagger enabled in dev mode and the default value is false.

properties.name: admin.config.username
properties.description: Username to create the first admin user when the application starts.

properties.name: admin.config.password
properties.description: Password to create the first admin user when the application starts.

properties.name: admin.config.sobrenome
properties.description: A surname for admin user.

properties.name: admin.config.nome
properties.description: A name for admin user.

properties.name: admin.config.email
properties.description: An email to admin user.

properties.name: api.issuer
properties.description: The link (URL) of the backend APIs (issuer of token JWT).

properties.name: jwt.private.key
properties.description: A private RSA Key to encode JWT Tokens.

properties.name: jwt.public.key
properties.description: A public RSA Key to decode JWT Tokens.

properties.name: front-end.url
properties.description: The link (URL) of the frontend application.

properties.name: xlsx.file.limit
properties.description: Line limit of files '.xlsx' according to the official Microsoft documentation: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/what-to-do-if-a-data-set-is-too-large-for-the-excel-grid-976e6a34-9756-48f4-828c-ca80b3d0e15c

properties.name: import-csv.redis.key
properties.description: The redis key for the result of the import products by csv method

properties.name: import-xml.redis.key
properties.description: The redis key for the result of the import products by xml method

properties.name: aws.endpoint
properties.description: URL to the AWS S3 endpoint

properties.name: aws.region
properties.description: The region of the AWS S3 buckets

properties.name: aws.access.key
properties.description: The access key to AWS S3

properties.name: aws.secret.key
properties.description: The secret key to AWS S3

properties.name: aws.images.bucket.name
properties.description: Name of the images bucket in AWS S3

properties.name: aws.reports.bucket.name
properties.description: Name of the reports bucket in AWS S3

properties.name: contabo.access.hash
properties.description: The contabo hash to access the storage

properties.name: logotipo-email-template
properties.description: URL to the image that will be used as a logo in the email template

properties.name: nfe.api.url
properties.description: URL to the API responsible by download the XML of the NFe

properties.name: wss.api.url
properties.description: URL to the API responsible to send messages in real time using WebSocket to frontend

properties.name: swagger.tryitout.enabled
properties.description: A boolean value to enable or disable the swagger tests

properties.name: generate.admin.user
properties.description: A boolean value to define if the admin user will be generated automatically
